31335.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>As requested, just the two of us, me and
<cs_pchero>. Hey! Come on out, Sainz!!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31335.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「要求通り　オレと　<cs_pchero>の
　ふたりだけで　来てやったぞぉ！
　おらっ！　出てこいよ　セインズ！！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31335.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 시킨 대로 나와 <cs_pchero>
　둘만 왔다!
　자! 어서 나와라, 세인즈!!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31335.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>我和<cs_pchero>已经照你的要求，
只有两个人过来！
喂！给我出来，赛因兹！！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31335.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>我和<cs_pchero>已經照你的要求，
只有兩個人過來！
喂！給我出來，賽因茲！！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31336.en: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>...I've been waiting for you.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31336.ja: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「……待ちかねましたよ。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31336.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>……我等你们很久了。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31336.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>……我等你們很久了。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31337.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>...I wonder if you actually brought your
Battle Master Proof?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31337.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「……バトルマスターの証は
　ちゃんと　持ってきたんでしょうね？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31337.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: ……배틀 마스터의 증표는
　가져오셨겠죠?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31337.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>……你们把战斗大师之证
拿来了吧？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31337.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>……你們有把戰鬥大師之證
拿來吧？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31338.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Aah. I never leave with out it. But I
didn't know ya wanted it that badly.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31338.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「ああ。肌身　はなさずにな。
　しかし　オメーが　そんなにまで
　こいつを　欲しがってたとは知らなかったぜ。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31338.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 그래, 언제나 몸에 지니고 있지.
　그나저나 네가 이 정도로
　이걸 탐낼 줄은 몰랐다.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31338.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>有，片刻不离。
但我都不知道，原来
你这么想要这东西啊。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31338.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>有，片刻不離。
但我都不知道，原來
你這麼想要這東西啊。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31339.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>You didn't allow me to have my proof,
that's why...<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31339.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「そいつは　アンタが　オレのことを
　認めなかった証ですからね……。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31339.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 그건 당신이 절
　인정하지 않았다는 증거니까요…….<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31339.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>毕竟那东西是你不承认
我的证据啊……<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31339.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>畢竟那東西是你不承認
我的證據啊……<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31340.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>From now on, I'll defeat your prized pupil
and prove myself worthy of inheriting the
Battle Master Proof!<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31340.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「今から　アンタの自慢の弟子を倒し
　オレこそが　証を受け継ぐにふさわしい
　バトルマスターだって　証明してやるぜっ！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31340.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 지금부터 당신의 자랑스러운 제자를 쓰러뜨려
　저야말로 그 증표를 잇기에 합당한
　배틀 마스터라는 걸 증명하겠습니다!<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31340.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>我现在要打倒你引以为傲的弟子，
证明我才是值得继承头衔的
战斗大师！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31340.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>我現在要打倒你引以為傲的弟子，
證明我才是值得繼承頭銜的
戰鬥大師！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31341.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Ya still don't get it, do ya. We're not mad
warriors... And being strong isn't enough,
is it.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31341.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「オメーは　相変わらず　わかっちゃいねーな。
　オレたちは　狂戦士じゃないんだ……。
　強けりゃ　それでいいってもんじゃねえ。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31341.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 넌 아직도 못 깨달은 거냐.
　우린 광전사가 아니야…….
　힘만 추구한다고 되는 게 아니란 말이다.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31341.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>你还是一样什么都不懂。
我们不是狂战士……
并不是只要强悍就好。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31341.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>你還是一樣什麼都不懂。
我們不是狂戰士……
並不是只要強悍就好。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31342.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>You're always going on about that! A battle
master's reason to live is to fight. What
value is there other than strength?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31342.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「アンタは　いつだって　それだ！
　バトルマスターは　戦いに生きる存在だぜ。
　強さ以外に　なんの価値があるってんだ！？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31342.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 당신은 늘 그 소리군! 배틀 마스터는
　싸움에 죽고, 싸움에 사는 존재야.
　힘 외에 뭐가 중요하단 거지!?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31342.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>你每次都讲这种话！
战斗大师就是为了战斗而活。
除了强悍，还会有什么价值啊？！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31342.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>你每次都講這種話！
戰鬥大師就是為了戰鬥而活。
除了強悍，還會有什麼價值啊！？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31343.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>...Fine. The <cs_pchero> that I brought up
and trained would never lose to such a guy.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31343.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「……まあいいさ。
　そんなヤツに　オレが手塩にかけて育てた
　<cs_pchero>が　負けるはずねーからな。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31343.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 됐다.
　너 같은 녀석에게 내가 공들여 훈련시킨
　{cs_pchero}|hpp(이,가) 질 리 없으니까.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31343.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……算了，
我苦心栽培的<cs_pchero>
不可能会输给这种家伙。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31343.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……算了，
我苦心栽培的<cs_pchero>
不可能會輸給這種傢伙。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31344.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>That's why I've left the rest to you,
<cs_pchero>!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31344.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「そういうワケだ。
　あとのことは　まかせたぜ。<cs_pchero>！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31344.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 얘기 들었지?
　그럼 뒷일을 부탁한다, <cs_pchero>!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31344.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>事情就是这样。
剩下就拜托你了，<cs_pchero>！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31344.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>事情就是這樣。
剩下就拜託你了，<cs_pchero>！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31345.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, I hold no grudge against you.
But to prove my strength, I'll have to
beat you!<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31345.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>。お前のことは　恨んじゃいねえ。
　だが　オレの強さを　証明するために
　たたきのめさせてもらうぜ！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31345.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 딱히 네게 원한은 없다.
　하지만 내 힘을 증명하기 위해
　여기서 널 쓰러뜨리겠다!<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31345.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，我并不恨你。
但为了证明我的强悍，
我要把你痛打一顿！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31345.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，我並不恨你。
但為了證明我的強悍，
我要把你痛打一頓！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31346.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>If there's something to blame, it's your own
carelessness in becoming Jakov's apprentice!!<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31346.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「恨むんなら　ジェイコフの弟子になった
　自分のウカツさを　恨むんだな！！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31346.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 원망하려거든 제이콥의 제자가 된
　네 안이함을 원망해라!!<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31346.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>要恨的话，就恨你自己太不谨慎，
成为杰克弗的弟子！！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31346.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>要恨的話，就恨你自己太不謹慎，
成為傑克弗的弟子！！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31347.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>What took you so long, <cs_pchero>. Got
tired of waiting around, didn't ya.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31347.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「おせーよ　<cs_pchero>。
　待ちくたびれたじゃねーか。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31347.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 늦었잖냐, <cs_pchero>.
　기다리다 목 빠지는 줄 알았다.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31347.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>太慢了，<cs_pchero>，
等你够久的了。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31347.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>太慢了，<cs_pchero>，
等你夠久的了。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31348.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>I thought for sure you had ran off...
Guess you hadn't taken enough of a beating.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31348.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「てっきり　逃げだしたかと思ったが……
　まだ　痛めつけられ足りないようだな。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31348.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 도망친 줄 알았는데……
　아직 혼이 덜 난 모양이군.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31348.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>我还以为你逃走了……
看来给你的痛苦还不够多啊。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31348.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>我還以為你逃走了……
看來給你的痛苦還不夠多啊。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31349.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>Now then, this time let's settle who's
really worthy of the Battle Master Proof!<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31349.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「さあ　今度こそ　どちらが
　バトルマスターの証を継ぐに　ふさわしいか
　決着をつけようぜ！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31349.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 자, 이번에야말로 누가 더
　배틀 마스터의 증표를 잇기에 적합한지
　결판을 내자!<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31349.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>来吧，这次就分个高下，
看谁才配继承
战斗大师之证！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31349.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>來吧，這次就分個高下，
看誰才配繼承
戰鬥大師之證！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31350.en: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>Guuh... Damn! Why? Why can't I win!?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31350.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「ぐうっ……クソッ！
　なぜだ？　なぜ　勝てないっ！？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31350.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 크윽…… 젠장!
　왜지? 왜 이길 수 없는 거야!?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31350.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>唔唔……可恶！
为什么？我为什么赢不了？！<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31350.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>唔唔……可惡！
為什麼？我為什麼贏不了！？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31351.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>I threw away everything solely for the
reason of becoming strong.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31351.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「オレは　ただ　ひたすら　強くなるためだけに
　すべてを　なげうってきたってのに……。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31351.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: 난 이 힘을 얻기 위해
　모든 걸 포기했는데…….<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31351.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>我牺牲了一切，
就只为了变强啊……<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31351.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>我犧牲了一切，
就只為了變強啊……<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31352.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>...That's why. Yer strength is for yer own
sake. A true Battle Master is...<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31352.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「……だからだよ。オメーの強さは
　オメー自身のためのものでしかねえ。
　本当のバトルマスターってのは……<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31352.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: ……그렇기 때문이다.
　네 힘은 너 자신을 위한 것에 불과해.
　진정한 배틀 마스터는……<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31352.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……就是这样才不行，你的强悍就只是
为了你自己。
真正的战斗大师……<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31352.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……就是這樣才不行，你的強悍就只是
為了你自己。
真正的戰鬥大師……<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31353.en:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>Sainz, it wasn't easy pulling the strings
I did to give you a chance at revenge, and
look at you now, what a mess.<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31353.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>「セインズよ。せっかく　手を回して
　復讐の機会を与えてやったのに　そのザマか。<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31353.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>: 세인즈, 기껏 손을 써서
　복수할 기회를 만들어 줬건만 이 꼴이라니.<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31353.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>赛因兹啊，我明明努力
给你报仇的机会，结果你却是这副德性。<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31353.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>賽因茲啊，我明明努力
給你報仇的機會，結果你卻是這副德性。<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31354.en:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>...Well, that's fine. Now that you've brought
those two, you're no use to me. Die with
them!<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31354.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>「……まあ　いい。
　そのふたりを　呼び寄せたことで
　おまえは用済みだ。もろともに　死ねっ！<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31354.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>: ……뭐, 됐다.
　그 둘을 불러냈으니 이제 넌 필요 없다.
　함께 죽여 주마!<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31354.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>……算了，
既然把那两个人引过来，
那就没你的事了。去死吧！<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31354.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>……算了，
既然把那兩個人引過來，
那就沒你的事了。去死吧！<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31355.en: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>...Why did you do that for someone like me?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31355.ja: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「……どうして　オレなんかを？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31355.ko: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: ……왜 저 같은 놈을?<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31355.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>……为什么要对我这种人……？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31355.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>……為什麼要對我這種人……？<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31356.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>...What belongs to the apprentice, belongs
to the master. Yer life belongs to me.
I won't let ya just die!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31356.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「……弟子のモノは　師匠のモノ。
　オメーの命は　オレのモノってことさ。
　勝手に　死なせやしねーぞ！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31356.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: ……제자 것은 스승의 것.
　네 목숨도 내 거란 뜻이다.
　내 허락도 없이 죽게 놔둘 것 같으냐!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31356.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……弟子的东西，就是师父的东西。
所以你的命就是我的，
我不会让你随便就死的！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31356.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>……徒弟的東西，就是師父的東西。
所以你的命就是我的，
我不會讓你隨便就死的！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31357.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Damn...sorry, <cs_pchero>. I leave ya to
deal with this monster.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31357.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「くっ……悪いな　<cs_pchero>。 
　このバケモノの相手は　オメーにまかせる。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31357.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 큭…… 미안하다, <cs_pchero>. 
　이 괴물의 상대는 네게 맡기마.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31357.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>唔……抱歉啊，<cs_pchero>， 
这只怪物就交给你对付了。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31357.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>唔……抱歉啊，<cs_pchero>， 
讓你負責對付這種怪物。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31358.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Come back right away, once ya've made the
perfect battle preparations. We'll hold
this place together until then!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31358.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「すぐに　戦闘の準備を万全にして
　戻ってきてくれ。それまで　この場は
　なんとか　もたせておくからよ！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31358.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 어서 전투 준비를 마치고 돌아와라.
　그때까진 어떻게든 막아보마!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31358.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>立刻做好万全的
战斗准备后回来。在那之前，我会想办法
撑住场面的！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31358.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>立刻做好萬全的
戰鬥準備後回來。在那之前，我會想辦法
撐住場面的！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46607.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Sainz, burn it into yer memory.
<cs_pchero> is going to show you a true
battle master's fight.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46607.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「セインズ　目に焼きつけとけよ。 
　<cs_pchero>が　真のバトルマスターの戦いを
　見せてくれるはずだからな。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46607.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 세인즈 똑똑히 봐라.
　{cs_pchero}|hpp(이,가) 진짜 배틀 마스터의 싸움을
　보여 줄 테니까.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46607.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>赛因兹，你睁大眼睛看好了。 
<cs_pchero>会让你见识到真正的战斗大师
是如何战斗的。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46607.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>賽因茲，你睜大眼睛看好了。 
<cs_pchero>會讓你見識到真正的戰鬥大師
是如何戰鬥的。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31359.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>What took you so long, <cs_pchero>. Got
tired of waiting around, didn't ya.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31359.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「おせーよ　<cs_pchero>。
　待ちくたびれたじゃねーか。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31359.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 늦었잖냐, <cs_pchero>.
　기다리다 목 빠지는 줄 알았다.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31359.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>太慢了，<cs_pchero>，
等你够久的了。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31359.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>太慢了，<cs_pchero>，
等你夠久的了。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

31360.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Alright, show Stupid Sainz here how a true
battle master does it!!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31360.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「いいな。セインズのバカたれに
　真のバトルマスターの　すごみを
　教えてやってくれ！！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31360.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 이 멍청한 세인즈 녀석한테
　배틀 마스터의 진정한 힘을
　보여 줘라!! 알았냐!?<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31360.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>你听好了！让赛因兹这笨蛋
知道什么才是战斗大师
真正厉害的地方！！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
31360.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>你聽好了！讓賽因茲這笨蛋
知道什麼才是戰鬥大師
真正厲害的地方！！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

46606.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Now, show Stupid Sainz here how a true
battle master does it!!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46606.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「今度こそ　セインズのバカたれに
　真のバトルマスターの　すごみを
　教えてやってくれ！！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46606.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 이번에야말로 저 멍청한 세인즈 녀석한테
　배틀 마스터의 진정한 힘을
　보여 줘라!! 알았냐!?<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46606.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>这次一定要让赛因兹这笨蛋
知道什么才是真正的战斗大师！！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
46606.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>這次一定要讓賽因茲這笨蛋
知道什麼才是真正的戰鬥大師！！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

60360.en: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>I-idiotic... My strongest pet...<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60360.ja: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>「バ　バカな……わしの最強のペットが……。<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60360.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>: 마, 말도 안 돼……
　내 최강의 반려 마물이…….<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60360.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>怎、怎么会……我最强的宠物竟然……<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60360.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>怎、怎麼可能……我最強的寵物竟然會……<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>

60361.ja: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>「ひ　ひいっっ！！<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60361.ko: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>: 히, 히이익!!<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>

60362.en: <start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Oops. This time ya're not getting away!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60362.ja: <start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「おっと。今度こそ　逃がしゃしねーぞ！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60362.ko: <start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 흥, 이번에는 놓치지 않겠다!<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60362.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>哼哼。这次可不会再让你跑了！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60362.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>喔，這次可不會再讓你跑了！<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

60363.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>...Brandon. Your ambitions are already done
for. It's time to give up.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60363.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「……ブランドンさん。
　あんたの野望も　もう　おしまいだ。
　そろそろ　観念しようぜ。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60363.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: ……브랜든 씨.
　당신의 야망도 이제 끝이야.
　그만 단념하자.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60363.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>布兰登，
你的野心到此为止了，
你放弃吧。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60363.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>……布蘭登，
你的野心也到此為止了，
放棄吧。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

60364.ja: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>「ちくしょう……ちくしょう。<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60364.ko: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>: 젠장…… 젠장.<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60364.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>可恶……可恶。<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60364.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n01420 _normal m00001>可惡……可惡。<stop_lip_animation n01420 CLOSE_MOUTH>

60365.en:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, after watching you fight, I
think I understand what Master was talking
about.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60365.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>。
　お前の戦いを見ていて　師匠の言うことが
　わかったような気がするよ。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60365.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>.
　네 싸움을 보며 스승님의 말씀을
　이해하게 된 것 같다.<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60365.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，
看着你的战斗，
我好像明白师父说的那句话了。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60365.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01407 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，
看著你的戰鬥，我好像懂了
我師父說過的話。<stop_lip_animation n01407 CLOSE_MOUTH>

60366.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Fighting not for yerself, but for another...
That's what a sword is for. That's what it
means to be a battle master.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60366.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「自分のためじゃなく
　誰かのために戦う……そのための剣。
　それが　バトルマスターだってことさ。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60366.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 자신을 위해서가 아니라
　누군가를 위해 싸우는…… 그러기 위한 검.
　그것이 배틀 마스터라는 걸.<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60366.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>不为自己，而是为他人战斗……
为他人而挥剑。
这才是战斗大师。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60366.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>不為自己，
而是為他人而戰……為他人而揮劍，
這樣才是戰鬥大師。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>

60367.en:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>Well, that settles the matter. Let's head
back to Luckland Island's Colosseum...<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60367.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>「さあ　これにて　一件落着だ。
　ラッカラン島のコロシアムに
　戻るとするか……。<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60367.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>: 자, 이렇게 마무리됐군.
　라카란섬의 콜로세움으로
　돌아갈까…….<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60367.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>好，
这下事情全解决了。
回到拉卡兰岛竞技场吧……<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
60367.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01426 _normal m00001>好，這下事情就解決了。
我們回到拉卡蘭島的
競技場吧……<stop_lip_animation n01426 CLOSE_MOUTH>
